target_markets.market_description: Fortune 500 companies and large enterprises needing business innovation, website design, and app development
pain_points: finding trusted partners for large contracts
target_markets.market_size_indicators: mentions of million to $2 million dollar year contracts

target_markets.market_description: Sports media entrepreneurs building content empires

problems_validated.problem: Burnout occurs when people do things that don't energize them, not necessarily from overwork
problems_validated.severity: high - affects productivity and business performance
problems_validated.market_gap: focus on hours worked rather than energy management and alignment with passion

problems_validated.problem: Difficulty building trust quickly in business relationships and sales
problems_validated.severity: high - critical for sales success and team building
problems_validated.market_gap: lack of systematic framework for building trust efficiently

products_tools.name: Content creation for trust building
products_tools.use_case: building internet audiences to establish credibility and trust before sales meetings
products_tools.metrics: works 24/7, reaches thousands of people per piece of content

business_strategies.strategy: Building internet audiences through content to establish trust and credibility before sales meetings
business_strategies.implementation: Create consistent content that demonstrates expertise and builds connection with target audience
business_strategies.expected_results: Prospects know who you are before first meeting, easier to close large contracts
business_strategies.case_study: Recording podcast once reaches thousands, potential clients discover them while they're sleeping or on vacation

business_strategies.strategy: Productized Partnerships - becoming a trusted advisor and partner rather than just service provider
business_strategies.implementation: Use productized services for internal operations, not as outbound marketing strategy
business_strategies.expected_results: Stronger client relationships and recurring business

problems_solutions.problem: How to build trust quickly in business relationships
problems_solutions.solution: Use the three C's framework: Credibility, Competency, and Connection
steps: Form connection first - find common threads like shared interests
Demonstrate credibility through examples and track record
Show competency by discussing solutions and understanding their problems
Ask lots of questions to understand their goals

problems_solutions.problem: Burnout from doing work that doesn't energize you
problems_solutions.solution: Focus on energy management rather than time management - do things that get you fired up
steps: Identify what charges vs drains your batteries
Work with people that get you fired up
Focus on projects aligned with your interests and strengths

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Using productized services as an outbound marketing strategy
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: ineffective marketing and poor client relationships
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Use productized services for internal operations only

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Focusing only on hours worked rather than energy alignment when addressing burnout
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: continued burnout despite reasonable work hours
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Focus on doing work that energizes you rather than just managing time
mistakes_to_avoid.example: burnout can occur without working excessive hours if you're doing draining work

growth_tactics.tactic: Create content that works as a 24/7 salesperson to build trust and credibility
steps: Record content once that reaches thousands
growth_tactics.results_expected: prospects know who you are before first meeting, easier sales process

metrics_kpis.benchmark: prospects knowing who you are before first meeting
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: measure how often prospects mention your content in initial meetings
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: focus on the three C's: credibility, competency, and connection

trends_signals.trend: Productized partnerships becoming more important than just productized services
trends_signals.opportunity: becoming trusted advisors rather than just service providers

trends_signals.trend: Energy management over time management for preventing burnout
trends_signals.opportunity: tools and services focused on energy alignment rather than time optimization

actionable_quotes.quote: everyone runs on batteries so you have to figure out what charges and drains yours
actionable_quotes.context: discussing burnout prevention and energy management
actionable_quotes.actionability: audit your activities to identify what energizes vs drains you

actionable_quotes.quote: most things boil down to desired outcome plus trust
actionable_quotes.context: key framework for business building, sales, and team management
actionable_quotes.actionability: focus on understanding what people want and building trust to help them achieve it

actionable_quotes.quote: content is the salesperson that works for you 24/7
actionable_quotes.context: explaining the value of building internet audiences
actionable_quotes.actionability: invest in creating content to build trust and credibility at scale

actionable_quotes.quote: connection might be your best bet to stand out in a sea of sameness
actionable_quotes.actionability: focus on building genuine connections when competency and credibility are commoditized
